channel.title: Sonmez on Brian Z
channel.description: Recent content in Sonmez on Brian Z

item.title: On technical blogging
item.description: As I mentioned in my inaugural post, I had been wanting to start a technical blog for some time. Mainly a a way of capturing things I learn or discover so that it can benefit others. As an engineer I consume a lot of content on the web. Let’s face it, when we hit some technical hurdle or are trying to figure something out that we haven’t seen before, our job become that of an internet sleuth, combing the web for answers on StackOverflow, blogs, etc.
